title: I Was Designed

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Once per game, choose a player to become your designer, opening a permanent chat with them. Together, you can create a role that you will become.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your goal and alignment will always be the same as your designer.
- You may only use attack values/defence values/abilities/attributes from the roles of dead players in the game, although you may combine elements and may change wording or details in order for the new role to make sense.
- The host must approve of the role for you to become it.
- After becoming a new role, you are permanently framed and will show unfavourable results to investigative roles.
